net.bubbaland.trivia

Class UserList

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.bubbaland.trivia.UserList

  • public class UserList
extends java.lang.Object
    A data structure to track user names, last activity time and role.
    Author:
    Walter Kolczynski

    • Method Detail

      • changeUser

        public void changeUser(java.lang.String oldUser,
              java.lang.String newUser)
        Change a user name and transfer the role.
        Parameters:
        oldUser - The old user name
        newUser - The new user name

      • getActive

        public java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,UserList.Role> getActive(int window,
                                                            int timeout)
        Get the users and roles that have been active. Active means having changed something on the server.
        Parameters:
        window - Number of seconds without making a change before becoming idle
        Returns:
        The user names and roles of users who have been active within the activity window

      • getIdle

        public java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,UserList.Role> getIdle(int window,
                                                          int timeout)
        Get the users and roles that are idle. Idle means they are still contacting the server for updates, but haven't made any changes.
        Parameters:
        window - Number of seconds without making a change before becoming idle
        timeout - Number of second before a disconnected user should be considered timed out
        Returns:
        The user names and roles of users who have not been active but have still received an update within the timeout window

      • updateRole

        public void updateRole(java.lang.String user,
              UserList.Role role)
        Update the role of a user.
        Parameters:
        user - The user's name
        role - The new role

      • updateUserActivity

        public void updateUserActivity(java.lang.String user)
        Update user's last activity time.
        Parameters:
        user - The user's name

      • userHandshake

        public void userHandshake(java.lang.String user)
        Update user's last contact time.
        Parameters:
        user - The user's name
